mapper.insert: insert into jy_scm_pur_order_interim_interim ( sourceNo, userId, arrivalDate, totalNum, mdtlId, status ) values ( #{sourceNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{arrivalDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{totalNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mdtlId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=NUMERIC} )
mapper.select:
select distinct t.sourceNo,t.userId,t.arrivalDate,t.totalNum from jy_scm_pur_order_interim t where 1=1
AND t.status=#{param.status}

select t.* from jy_scm_pur_order_interim t left join jy_base_account a on a.id=t.userid where t.status != #{status}
and a.orgid IN (SELECT jbg.id FROM jy_base_org jbg start with jbg.id=#{orgId} connect by prior jbg.id = jbg.pid)

select distinct t.sourceNo as sourceNo, t.userId as userId, t.arrivalDate as arrivalDate, t.totalNum as totalNum from jy_scm_pur_order_interim t left join jy_base_account a on a.id=t.userid where t.status != #{status}
and a.orgid IN (SELECT jbg.id FROM jy_base_org jbg start with jbg.id=#{orgId} connect by prior jbg.id = jbg.pid)
